name: Angelica
alt: happy grains yellow 25kg sack of super angelica rice with dragon and wheat
summary: Angelica is a relatively new rice variety. Tolerant to various climatic conditions, this rice can withstand harsh climates and supply demand more easily than other rice varieties.
for: Great rice for daily meals at home

name: Broken
alt: happy grains blue and white 25kg sack of broken rice
summary: Despite the name, broken rice isn’t any less in quality compared to other rice. It’s smaller in length but quality, taste and nutrients are still there while being one of the cheapest rice choice out there.
for: Cooks fast and absorbs flavors easily
Best for commercial use (karinderyas, eateries, restaurants, etc.)

name: Brown
alt: happy grains green and yellow 25kg sack of sinandomeng rice with beehive honeycomb sunflower graphics
summary: One of the most popular type of rice due to its nutritional content and simplicity. Brown rice is a whole grain, containing more nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.
for: Good for many types of diet
